title: Meters - nonideal V and ideal A readings

content.question:
A battery, a resistor, a nonideal voltmeter, and an ideal ammeter are connected in a circuit, as shown in the figure. Which of the following indicates whether each meter gives a correct or an incorrect reading for the potential difference across and current in the resistor?
Voltmeter ReadingAmmeter ReadingACorrectCorrectBCorrectIncorrectCIncorrectCorrectDIncorrectIncorrect

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
